items.sentence: Tom tried speaking French to them, but they didn't seem to understand.
Tom got there early to make sure everything had been set up correctly.
It was disappointing that nobody ate the expensive sushi I had served.
Mary hiked her skirt up to mid-thigh and dipped her toes in the water.
Tom's mother told him he'd get a good hiding when his father got home.
Write down the medications you need, and I'll try to get them for you.
I see no reason we need to wait until Tom gets here to start drinking.
I wouldn't have thought I would someday look up "Viagra" in Wikipedia.
I drank a lot of coffee today, so I probably won't sleep well tonight.
Tom's behavior had very negative effects on the people he worked with.
